Table Output from the Form Example

Name City Age
Matt Provo 26

Without a database behind the scenes on a website, you can't store information and use it later on in your website. MySQL is the most popular website database right now. As you can see above, because of the MySQL database running behind the scenes, the website can take the data you entered into the form and reassemble it on a different page!
